attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 2012 olympic logo is terrible, obscure and looks like it was made by a four year-old. I would like to see it scrapped.

Further more, I would like to see an immediate investigation into where the £400,000 that was spent on the logo went.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
